text: Lucas Severino (born 3 January 1979) is a Brazilian football player. He plays for Gamba Osaka. ==Career statistics== Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;選手名鑑 2013 (NSK MOOK)", 14 February 2013, Japan, (p. 89 out of 266) Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Club Atlético Paranaense 1998 Série A 15 3 15 3 1999 28 11 28 11 2000 0 0 0 0 Total 43 14 43 14 Rennes 2000–01 Division 1 28 4 28 4 2001–02 33 2 33 2 2003–04 Ligue 1 11 0 11 0 Total 72 6 72 6 Cruzeiro 2002 Série A 7 0 7 0 Corinthians 2003 Série A 3 0 3 0 FC Tokyo 2004 J1 League 27 11 3 1 7 6 – 37 18 2005 30 7 1 0 2 0 – 33 7 2006 31 18 2 2 5 0 – 38 20 2007 32 12 3 0 8 2 – 43 14 Total 120 48 9 3 22 8 0 0 151 59 Gamba Osaka 2008 J1 League 31 8 5 1 4 1 9 6 49 16 2009 30 6 6 8 2 0 5 0 43 14 2010 19 7 3 1 2 1 4 1 28 10 Total 80 21 14 10 8 2 18 7 120 40 Atlético Paranaense 2011 Série A 16 4 4 3 0 0 0 0 20 7 FC Tokyo 2011 J2 League 23 9 6 3 – – 29 12 2012 J1 League 34 10 1 0 4 1 5 0 44 11 2013 34 11 3 0 1 1 – 38 12 Total 91 30 10 3 5 2 5 0 111 35 Career total 432 123 37 19 35 12 23 7 527 161 ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Ribeirão Preto
